questionnaire.name: What's your opinion about the cources Prog.kiev.ua

question.answer: It was possible to make it more informative

question.body: Is there enough information received at the lecture to study the topic?
question.answer: No, there is not too much information
It would be better to make the lectures longer

question.answer: From time to time, depends on homework
